actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide assistance for condominiums and housing cooperatives damaged by a major disaster, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to expand the definitions of "individual" and "household" to include condominium and housing cooperative associations, thus authorizing assistance for repairs to and replacement of condominiums and housing cooperatives damaged by a major disaster. Requires the maximum amount of assistance for any such association to receive under such Act for a single disaster to be determined by the President and adjusted annually.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide assistance for condominiums and housing cooperatives damaged by a major disaster, and for other purposes.
